skillTree.name: Supreme Shield of the Old Ones
skillTree.description: More than just a shield, this one channels the visceral power of the Old Ones to protect its bearer from magical attack.

effects.description: Ability: "Supreme Shield of the Old Ones"

unit_ability.description: Supreme Shield of the Old Ones

effects.description: Cooldown: -25% to "Supreme Shield of the Old Ones"
Ability: "Supreme Shield of the Old Ones"

unit_ability.description: Supreme Shield of the Old Ones

effects.description: Cooldown: -50% to "Supreme Shield of the Old Ones"
Ability: "Supreme Shield of the Old Ones"

unit_ability.description: Supreme Shield of the Old Ones

skillTree.name: Greater Ward of the Old Ones
skillTree.description: Those who serve the Great Plan are afforded the Old Ones' protection via ancient incantations and bygone utterances.

skillTree.name: Eternal Guardians
skillTree.description: Kroak's ancient lineage provide a powerful telepathic link by which orders are conveyed and the Old Ones' will is reinforced.

skillTree.name: First Spawning
skillTree.description: As one of the First Generation of Slann, Kroak knows much about long-forgotten magics and ingenious, war-winning technology thought obsolete.

skillTree.name: Irrepressible
skillTree.description: You cannot kill what's already dead.

skillTree.name: Telekinesis
skillTree.description: The power to move objects without touching them makes missiles attacks against this one largely pointless.

skillTree.name: Protection of the Old Ones
skillTree.description: Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.

skillTree.name: Reserves of Eldritch Energy
skillTree.description: The power of the Old Ones, stored for future use so that - at precisely the right time - the Great Plan may be advanced.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve minimum: +10

skillTree.name: Becalming Cogitation
skillTree.description: Contemplation is the path to alignment, to the correct interpretation of the Great Plan.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -50% when increasing
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Arcane Convergence
skillTree.description: All shall be one, as it is written.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +20% when increasing

skillTree.name: Unfathomable Presence
skillTree.description: The Mage-Priest's thought patterns are so alien that they are even beyond the perception of enemy Wizards.

skillTree.name: The Harrowing Scrutiny
skillTree.description: Within the Slann's gaze shines the cold-blooded scrutiny of the Old Ones.

skillTree.name: Transcendent Healing
skillTree.description: When wounded, the Slann's sheer force of will literally recombines his body.

skillTree.name: Higher State of Consciousness
skillTree.description: "Everywhere we shine, death and life burn into something new…"

skillTree.name: Deliverance of Itza 1
skillTree.description: Mighty Lord Kroak spawns a small sun that, when it explodes, causes abject devastation… funnily enough.

ui_effects.description: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Deliverance of Itza I"

ui_effects.description: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Deliverance of Itza I"

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.name: Stimulate Growth
skillTree.description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.name: Boost Income
skillTree.description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.name: Colossal Deliverance
skillTree.description: Mere walls cannot prevent Kroak from reaching his target.

skillTree.name: Trancendental State
skillTree.description: After a great act of power and violence, the ability to quickly return to a state of grace is valuable indeed.

skillTree.name: Ultimate Deliverance
skillTree.description: Nothing shall - or could - stand in Kroak's way. Nothing.

backgroundSkills.name: The Spirit of the Venerable Lord Kroak
backgroundSkills.description: Lord Kroak's power is that of a First Generation Slann, his connection with the Old Ones far greater than any of his living kin.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
